import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; export const Filter = () => { return ( <>
Home > Filter
Filtering Criteria Form (Variable By Context)
Apply Filter
) } export default Filter;
